title: Anyone know how to fix "Unable to connect to login queue" probelm
body:
I was able to login to league yesterday without any problems. When I tried this morning it came up with an error saying "Unable to connect to login queue" and it doesn't let me login. I've tried everything on riot support and still can't login. I've tried initiating full repair and still doesn't work. Anyone know how to fix this problem?


P.S OCE server

replies.body: Hi ! I have exactly the same probleme like your and i'm on NA server... I guess it's means it won't come from our connexion then.... but probably from the server to us....
Having the same problem in the NA server
It looks like there were some login issues for players last night.  Everything appears to be okay now, so you should be able to login!  Thanks for the reports on this.
Having the same problem in the EU West server
Funny. I just installed an update on windows 10 and after that I can't login to league of legends. Is it really the update that screwed the server?
It doesn't let me when I try to.
